description.p: Step into a world where gastronomy meets fantasy in the Tasty Lands of Silverplate. This delectable yet brutal 5E experience invites you to explore a realm where culinary magic and epic adventure intertwine. Unleash your inner food hero as you embark on a journey filled with savory quests, flavorful characters, and a feast of immersive possibilities.

ul.li: New Subclasses for every core class
New Foodfolk race with endless possiblities
